original_text: Because that he remembered not to shew mercy, but persecuted the poor and needy man, that he might even slay the broken in heart.
korean_text: 그가 인자를 베풀 일을 생각하지 아니하고 가난하고 궁핍한 자와 마음이 상한 자를 핍박하여 죽이려 하였기 때문이니이다

sentences.original_text: Because that he remembered not to shew mercy
but persecuted the poor and needy man
that he might even slay the broken in heart
